text: Shoqata Çameria is a national political organisation supporting the rights of the Cham people and advocacy of the Cham issue. It is one of the main NGOs in Albania. It was created on 22 January 1991, which makes it one of the first NGOs registered since the pluralism. ==References== Category:Cham Albanians Category:Think tanks based in Albania Category:1991 establishments in Albania Category:Think tanks established in 1991 Category:Albania–Greece relations Category:Chameria
title: Shoqata Çamëria
